tool.name: qiime2 fragment-insertion classify-otus-experimental
tool.description: Experimental: Obtain taxonomic lineages, by finding closest OTU in reference phylogeny.

param.name: representative_sequences
param.label: representative_sequences: FeatureData[Sequence]
param.help: [required] The sequences used for a 'sepp' run to produce the 'tree'.

param.name: tree
param.label: tree: Phylogeny[Rooted]
param.help: [required] The tree resulting from inserting fragments into a reference phylogeny, i.e. the output of function 'sepp'

param.name: reference_taxonomy
param.label: reference_taxonomy: FeatureData[Taxonomy]
param.help: [required] Reference taxonomic table that maps every OTU-ID into a taxonomic lineage string.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: fragment-insertion classify-otus-experimental ====================================================== Experimental: Obtain taxonomic lineages, by finding closest OTU in reference phylogeny.
Outputs: -------- :classification.qza: Taxonomic lineages for inserted fragments.
|
Description: ------------ Experimental: Use the resulting tree from 'sepp' and find closest OTU-ID for every inserted fragment. Then, look up the reference lineage string in the reference taxonomy.
|
